oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kayne Avenue Missionary Baptist Church, 2001 June
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Kayne Avenue Missionary Baptist Church located at 1025 Twelfth Avenue South in Nashville, Tennessee. The congregation was founded in 1886 and has been under various names including College Street Baptist Church and Pennington Street Baptist Church. The congregation built this Twelfth Avenue location in 1973. The foundation is brick. The exterior walls are brick. The roof is comprised of tar shingles and is gabled in front, but flat in the rear. The windows are colored and frosted in the front, and tall with clear glass in the back. The doors are made of wooden and metal. There is a tall, metal freestanding cross atop the overhang, above the front doors. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kayne Avenue Missionary Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.); Kayne Avenue Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
